category.name: Active Workspace.Classification
category.category_description: Active Workspace preferences for Classification application

preference.name: AWC_cls_object_filter_sorting
preference.preference_description: Defines the classification object filter value(classification hierarchy) sorting type in filter panel. Valid values are Ascending/Descending/Count.Default value is Count. Ascending: Sort the hierarchy alphabetically in ascending order. Descending: Sort the hierarchy alphabetically in descending order. Count: Sort the hierarchy based on the number of instances for given filter value.
